Member Urho3D::Connection::ProcessSceneUpdate (int msgID, MemoryBuffer &msg)

Member Urho3D::Renderer::DrawDebugGeometry (bool depthTest)

Member Urho3D::Renderer::Update (float timeStep)

Member Urho3D::Script::OutputAPIRow (DumpMode mode, const String &row, bool removeReference=false, String separator=";")
We need C++11 <regex> in String class to handle REGEX whole-word replacement correctly. Can't do that since we still support VS2008.
